contracts:
EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT

THIS EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT (the 'Agreement') is made and entered into on [DATE], by and between [COMPANY NAME], a corporation organized and existing under the laws of [STATE/COUNTRY], with its principal place of business at [ADDRESS] (hereinafter referred to as the 'Employer'), and [EMPLOYEE NAME], residing at [ADDRESS] (hereinafter referred to as the 'Employee').

WHEREAS, the Employer desires to employ the Employee as [POSITION] and the Employee desires to accept such employment;

NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and agreements herein contained, the parties agree as follows:

  1. Term of Employment
  2. Duties and Responsibilities
  3. Compensation
  4. Benefits
  5. Termination

contracts:
NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT

This Non-Disclosure Agreement (the 'Agreement') is entered into as of [DATE] between:

Party A: [COMPANY NAME A], with its principal place of business at [ADDRESS A] ('Disclosing Party')

and

Party B: [COMPANY NAME B], with its principal place of business at [ADDRESS B] ('Receiving Party')

1. Definition of Confidential Information:
For purposes of this Agreement, 'Confidential Information' shall include all information or material that has or could have commercial value or other utility in the business in which Disclosing Party is engaged.

2. Obligations of Receiving Party:
2.1. Receiving Party shall hold and maintain the Confidential Information in strictest confidence.
2.2. Receiving Party shall not, without prior written approval of Disclosing Party, use, disclose, or divulge any such Confidential Information to any person or entity.
contratos:
```html ACORDO DE CONFIDENCIALIDADE ```

```html Este Acordo de Confidencialidade (o 'Acordo') é celebrado em [DATA] entre: ```

```html Parte A: [NOME DA EMPRESA A], com sua sede ```html principal ``` ```html principal ``` em [ENDEREÇO A] ('Parte Divulgadora') ```

```html e ```

```html Parte B: [NOME DA EMPRESA B], com sua sede ```html principal ``` ```html principal ``` em [ENDEREÇO B] ('Parte Receptora') ```

```html 1. Definição de Informação Confidencial: Para fins deste Contrato, 'Informação Confidencial' incluirá todas as informações ou materiais que tenham ou possam ter valor comercial ou outra utilidade nos negócios em que a Parte Divulgadora está envolvida. ```

```html 2. Obrigações da Parte Receptora: 2.1. A Parte Receptora deverá manter e preservar as Informações Confidenciais em estrita confidencialidade. 2.2. A Parte Receptora não deverá, sem aprovação prévia por escrito da Parte Divulgadora, usar, divulgar ou revelar qualquer Informação Confidencial a qualquer pessoa ou entidade. ```

contracts:
SALES AND PURCHASE AGREEMENT

THIS SALES AND PURCHASE AGREEMENT (the 'Agreement') is made on [DATE]

BETWEEN:

SELLER: [SELLER NAME], a company incorporated under the laws of [JURISDICTION], having its registered office at [ADDRESS] (hereinafter referred to as the 'Seller')

AND

BUYER: [BUYER NAME], a company incorporated under the laws of [JURISDICTION], having its registered office at [ADDRESS] (hereinafter referred to as the 'Buyer')

WHEREAS:

  1. The Seller is the owner of [DESCRIPTION OF GOODS/PROPERTY];
  2. The Buyer wishes to purchase the aforementioned [GOODS/PROPERTY];
  3. The Seller has agreed to sell and the Buyer has agreed to buy the [GOODS/PROPERTY] subject to the terms and conditions contained herein.

NOW IT IS HEREBY AGREED as follows:

1. Sale and Purchase
The Seller hereby agrees to sell and the Buyer hereby agrees to purchase the [GOODS/PROPERTY] at the price and on the terms set out in this Agreement.
